definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
meals (abbr. for 伙食[huo3 shi2])/variant of 夥|伙[huo3]
companion/partner/group/classifier for groups of people/to combine/together

sentences.english: Zhoubo, obtained his LLB degree from East China University of Politics and Law , is the senior partner of Shanghai Wintell Law Firm.
sentences.chinese: 华东政法大学法学学士，上海瀛泰律师事务所合伙人。

sentences.english: Managing Director and Partner, AsiaTech Management LLC.
sentences.chinese: 董事总经理，合伙人，治平投资。

sentences.english: Instead of it, he established a company with a partner.
sentences.chinese: 代而替之的，是他与一个合伙人建立了一个公司。

sentences.english: People began arriving at my ex-partner’s house almost immediately.
sentences.chinese: 人们几乎立刻开始来到我以前合伙人的房子。

sentences.english: The two partners split after a quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 这两个合伙人吵了一架之后分成道扬镳了。

sentences.english: He was a partner in a firm of solicitors in Holborn.
sentences.chinese: 他是荷尔本一家律师事务所的合伙人。

sentences.english: Aldisert is a partner at the law firm Kwika, in Santa Monica.
sentences.chinese: 他是圣莫尼卡的Kwika律师事务所合伙人。

sentences.english: For firms in search of capital and a low-key partner, CIC isappealing.
sentences.chinese: 对于寻找资金和低调合伙人的公司，中投很有吸引力。

sentences.english: He is a copartner of the attorney office.
sentences.chinese: 他是一家律师所的合伙人。

sentences.english: Milliman is an independent firm, owned totally by its Principals.
sentences.chinese: 明德是独立的公司，完全由合伙人持有。

sentences.english: The partners shall assume unlimited joint liability for the debts of the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 合伙人对企业债务负连带无穷责任。

sentences.english: Deng Feng of aurora borealis copartner thinks.
sentences.chinese: 北极光合伙人邓峰认为。

sentences.english: The good news is that the GP knows what they are managing.
sentences.chinese: 好消息就是普通合伙人知道如何干好本行。

sentences.english: Market value doesn't equal the sum of sweat equity invested by you and your partners.
sentences.chinese: 公司市值不等于你跟合伙人付出的劳动之和。

sentences.english: The new partner shall bear unlimited joint and several liability for the debts of the partnership incurred before he enters into the partnership.
sentences.chinese: 新合伙人对入伙前合伙企业的债务承担无限连带责任。

sentences.english: The American movie The Company is based on the international best-selling novel of exactly the same name.
sentences.chinese: 电影《合伙人》改编自一部同名的国际畅销小说。

definition: executive/senior management/(contraction of 高級管理|高级管理)
to begin an undertaking/to start a major task/to initiate/to venture/venture/entrepreneurship
private equity fund/fund offered to private placement (e.g. hedge fund)
to retire/to leave office/to quit a job
